content.rendered:
[vc_row 0=””][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text 0=””]

Roster Rate Mediation is a time-saving and cost-effective process, similar to that outlined for mandatory mediation sessions in the Ontario Rules of Civil Procedure. The fees range from $600 to $825 plus HST, depending on the number of parties, and the fee covers one half hour of preparation time per party and up to three hours of mediation.

The  following ADR Chambers Panel Members are available for Roster Rate Mediation (listed alphabetically). Each mediator’s biography and availability calendar can be accessed by clicking on the mediator’s name.

  • J.A. (Tony) Baker
  • Eban M. Bayefsky
  • The Honourable Roderick J. Flaherty
  • Jeffrey Freedlander
  • Ellen Fry
  • Donald L. Granatstein
  • Marvin J. Huberman
  • Richard H. Krempulec
  • Mark Lawrence
  • D. Bruce MacDougall
  • Oliver L. Martin
  • Michael Maynard
  • Derek Sarluis
  • Jason Stitt
  • Paul Wesley

To book a roster rate mediator, please call 1-800-856-5154 or 416-362-8555 or email adr@adrchambers.com.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Book a Roster Rate Mediation” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-calendar” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”154″][vc_custom_heading text=”General Information” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”70″][vc_custom_heading text=”Other Types of Mediation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”71″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
